judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the decision of this case.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed. See, Commonwealth v. Johnson, 428 Pa. 210, 236 A. 2d 805 (1968); Commonwealth v. McBride, 440 Pa. 81, 269 A. 2d 737 (1970); Commonwealth ex rel. Washington v. Maroney, 427 Pa. 599, 235 A. 2d 349 (1967).
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: John W. Packet, Assistant Defender, and Vincent J. Ziccardi, Defender, for appellant.

Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorney, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Johnson, Appellant.
Submitted November 9, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
John W. Packet, Assistant Defender, and Vincent J. Ziccardi, Defender, for appellant.
Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorney, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
April 22, 1971:
